description: The cause of the issue outlined in CVE-2023-6512 is an inappropriate implementation within the user interface of the Chromium web browser. This flaw exists due to a specific coding error in the Chromium open source software, which is utilized by Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based). This vulnerability potentially allows unintended interactions within the web browser's UI components. To resolve this, the latest version of Microsoft Edge, version 120.0.2210.61, has been released to eliminate this vulnerability. The identified build numbers are 120.0.2210.61 and the corresponding KB article is KB-120.0.2210.61.
